item.title: Analysis of Japanese firms' dividend and total payout policies (with Jason Bennett)
item.description: The academic literature has long assumed the existence of long-term dividend payout target ratios. With the exception of a small number of surveys, there is little hard evidence on what may guide payout targets, the level and evolution of targets. We construct a novel data set that identifies management attitudes towards payout targets using text mining and natural language processing techniques. We analyse our panel of firms using cross-sectional regressions controlling for standard risk factors and other variables.
